oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bryson & Camp Bill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Mystic Memphi; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bill from Bryson & Camp (upholsterers) to the "Mystic Memphi": lists hours worked and wages paid to employees for upholstery work on floats from the week of 1/20 to that of 2/3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
